snippet: Militants with the Islamic State group on Monday captured a military training camp west of the capital near the city of Hit as they inch closer to full control of Anbar Province.
abstract: Islamic State militants capture military training camp west of Baghdad near city of Hit as they inch closer to full control of Anbar Province in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Militants with the Islamic State group on Monday captured a military training camp west of the capital near the city of Hit as they inch closer to full control of Anbar Province.

headline.main: Iraq: An Exodus in Anbar, and Bombings in Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Iraq: An Exodus in Anbar, and Bombings in Baghdad
